front.title: SMTP Service Extension for Trust of Reliable Origin

abstract.t: This document defines an SMTP service extension [ESMTP] whereby anSMTP client may establish a trust relationship with the serverattesting its confidence in the validity of the originator of amessage. This confidence, or its absence, can then be used tomitigate the cost of undesirable messages (primarily spam) withoutdisrupting operations between, or with, SMTP implementations notsupporting the extension.
